title: Will Self-Mystery Gifting ever return?
body:
^^Title^^

Will it ever return? I enjoyed wasting $100 on RP then blowing it all on Self-Mystery Gifts to see what i get.

replies.body: Itll come back on some rare occasions  i imagine :)

Some people gamble at the races, Some people gamble at the slots, some people gamble in cards....

I guess we prefer the rush of Wtfcouldtheskinbeandwillitjustifytheprevious9000rpalreadyspent.

I'm with you though.
